title: Donkey Kong Country: Boss Blitz (1.5)
tooltip: Transforms the game into a boss rush mode with all 7 bosses{0}Only recommended for hardcore players!{0}- Supported: Rev 0 (US)

title: Donkey Kong Country: Expert Edition
tooltip: Removes the DK Barrels, Star Barrels, and Warp Barrels to make the game more challenging{0}Only recommended for hardcore players!{0}- Supported: Rev 0 (US)

title: Donkey Kong Country: German 60 Hz
tooltip: Forces the game into the German language with typo fixes included{0}- Supported: Rev 0 (US), Rev 1 (US), Rev 2 (US) & Rev VC (US)
